thread.title: Richard Jefferson hilariously shows his support for Kyrie Irving's flat earth idea
thread.title_full: Richard Jefferson hilariously shows his support for Kyrie Irving's flat earth idea

title: Richard Jefferson hilariously shows his support for Kyrie Irving's flat earth idea
text:
Feb 22, 2017 at 6:34p ET 0Shares 
The Cleveland Cavaliers apparently have no plans to let this whole “Flat Earth” thing die the quiet death it deserves. 
This past weekend at the NBA’s All-Star festivities, Cavs point guard Kyrie Irving sent the basketball world into a tizzy with his claim that the earth is flat, not a sphere, only to later indicate he was (probably) just trolling to get a reaction out of the media . 
And that should have been the end of the story, if not for Richard Jefferson wearing a “Flat World Champions” T-shirt on Wednesday, as one does: 
It appears as if the shirts are for sale, in case you want to fund the continued scientific illiteracy of our youth:
